title: champion select lagg
body: When in draft or ranked, champion select/ban laggs way to much, this has resulted in not being able to lock in my ban or pick which gave me a penalty several times now, ingame i experience no lagg, any tips?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
To start, do you have any third party apps like play.tv running?  They've been known to cause issues like crashes, and would recommend removing it.  

Otherwise, you could be having network problems that's causing you to desync in champion select and getting left behind.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to know for sure as well as tune up your connection to the game.  I hope it helps!
Yep I got leaver banned for 30m after client hung three times.  Funny thing was it let me Que three times with no 5m, 15m ban.
